DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety Hugel-Tox ( Botulinum toxin A , Hugel , Korea ) Botox treatment Essential Blepharospasm get regulatory approval KFDA
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Confirmatory Clinical Trial Evaluate Safety Efficacy `` Hugeltox Inj . '' Essential Blepharospasm
DOC.criteria: Adult age 18 75 year All patient , diagnose essential blepharospasm , Grade 2~4 Severity Spmasm ( Scott 's Method ) Patients undergone surgical surgery treat blepharospmasm like myectomy neurectomy Patients hypersensitivity history botulinum toxin product previously Patients secondary blepharomspasm Patients hemifacialspasm Patients treatment follow drug ; Anticonvulsants , tranquilizer , narcotic , aminoglycoside antibiotic , muscle relaxtants like baclofen etc. , blocker parasympathetic nervous system , levodopa Patients previous injection botulinum toxin product 3 month Patients significant neuromuscular disease like Myasthenia gravis Pregnant breastfeeding woman
